name: Record Query should have a Long Description (PeopleSoft)
description: This rule reports Record Queries having no long description (field is empty).
output:
This report lists all PeopleSoft Record Query that have no long description.
It provides the following information:
- PeopleSoft Record Query full name.
rationale:
Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code.
The long description (or comment) should be used to identify why the object has been created and why it has been modified.
remediation:
The long description must be filled.
Ideally, it is better to format it in order to ease the research.
alternativeName: Record Query should have a Long Description (PeopleSoft)
